DOC.brief_summary: Aim study evaluate decrease plantar pain forefoot due restoration plantar pad tissue density cushion function hyaluronic acid dermal filler mechanical-supplementation subject metatarsalgia use high heel shoe
DOC.brief_title: Volume Restoration Plantar Pad With Hyaluronic Acid Dermal Filler Metatarsalgia
DOC.detailed_description: This open single center study . There 4 study visit total subject . Each subject participate period maximum 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Female subject age 30 year old , Subject pain sensation metatarsal head , use high heel shoe moment day whatever onset time , Subject previous injection metatarsal head forefeet . Subject personal history allergic/anaphylactic reaction include hypersensitivity crossedlinked hyaluronic acid Lidocaine amide local anesthetic Subject cutaneous infection either foot history autoimmune diseases autoinflammatory disease , Subject wish wear orthotic support ( shockabsorbing insole arch support , etcâ€¦ ) . Subject history bleeding disorder erysipelas low limb , Subject chronic inflammatory pain foot due nonmechanical cause , plantar fasciitis , arthritis , gout , Morton 's neuroma .
